english: I need to save some money

chinese: 我需要存一些钱买一辆新车
english: I need to save some money to buy a new car
I need to save some money

chinese: 我需要为了未来存一些钱
english: I need to save some money for the future
to  save  some  money  for  the future

chinese: 每个人需要为了未来存一些钱
english: everybody needs to save some money for the future

chinese: 存足够的钱买一个房子
english: to save enough money to buy a house

chinese: 为了他的家庭买一个房子
english: to buy a house for his family

chinese: 为了他的家庭存足够的钱买一，个房子
english: to save enough money to buy a house for his family

chinese: 他（现在）正在尝试为了他的，家庭存足够的钱买一个房子
english: he  is  trying  to  save  enough money  to  buy  a  house  for  his family
a good way to save money

chinese: 这是存钱的一个好的方法
english: this  is  a  good  way  to  save money

chinese: 存钱的一个好的方法是这个
english: a  good  way  to  save  money  is this

chinese: 我（现在）正在尝试节省时间，和金钱
english: I  am  trying  to  save  time  and money

chinese: 节省时间和金钱最好的方法
english: the best way to save time and money

chinese: 在你做任何事情之前做一个计，划
english: to  make  a  plan  before  you  do anything

chinese: 节省时间和金钱最好的方法
english: the best way to save time and money

chinese: 节省时间和金钱最好的方法是，你做任何事情之前做一个计划
english: the best way to save time and money is to make a plan before you do anything

chinese: 节约水的一个好的方法
english: a good way to save water

chinese: 这是节约水的一个好的方法
english: this is a good way to save water

chinese: 节约水的一个好方法是这个
english: a good way to save water is this

chinese: 节约水的一个好方法在这里
english: a good way to save water is here

chinese: 节约水的一个好方法在那里
english: a  good  way  to  save  water  is there

chinese: 在那里有节约水的一个好方法
english: there  is  a  good  way  to  save water
there is a book on the desk
there is a knife in the kitchen
there  are  five  eggs  in  the kitchen

chinese: 节约水的许多不同的方法
english: many  different  ways  to  save water

chinese: 存在节约水的许多不同的方法
english: there are many different ways to save water

english: 1.在床上有一只狗。 2.在房间里有十个人。
